title: 代碼問題
author: polun
txt_content:
[21:58:06] [Netty IO #2/INFO] [FML]: Client protocol version 1
[21:58:06] [Netty IO #2/INFO] [FML]: Client attempting to join with 15 mods : Mu
tantCreatures@1.4.5,FML@7.2.125.1031,customnpcs@1.7.2-2,inventorytweaks@1.57-dev
-100,BambooMod@Minecraft1.7.2 ver2.6.5.1,TofuCraft@1.5.14.1-MC1.7.2,Forge@10.12.
0.1031,millenaire@5.2.0,voxelmap@1.7.2,AnimationAPI@1.2.1,weaponmod@1.7.2 v1.14.
2,mcp@8.09,TooManyItems@1.7.2[hukk汉化],moreplayermodels@1.7.2,DamageIndicatorsM
od@3.0.0.0
[21:58:06] [Netty IO #2/INFO] [FML]: Attempting connection with missing mods []
at CLIENT
[21:58:06] [Server thread/INFO]: darkgod lost connection: Internal Exception: ja
va.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Payload may not be larger than 32767 bytes
[21:58:11] [Server thread/INFO] [FML]: Unloading dimension 12

replies.author: 西瓜太郎
replies.txt_content: 有些客户端功能性文件不需要放入服务端，比如小地图、TooManyItems之类的，在服务端里删掉再试试

replies.author: jciloy
replies.txt_content: 客户端缺少mod，进不了，大概就是这样

replies.author: polun
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 polun 于 2014-6-3 22:37 编辑 
西瓜太郎 发表于 2014-6-3 18:06
有些客户端功能性文件不需要放入服务端，比如小地图、TooManyItems之类的，在服务端里删掉再试试 ...
好了 謝謝{:10_496:}
